items.sentence: Just because I'm quiet doesn't mean I have nothing to say.
I told Tom that he shouldn't believe everything Mary says.
Tom says that he can't remember his French teacher's name.
Tom says that he's dated three different women named Mary.
Tom grew up in Australia, but now he lives in New Zealand.
Tom said he was going back to the hospital this afternoon.
Tom can play the clarinet. He can play the saxophone, too.
My birthday is in October and my brother's is in November.
I used to drink a lot of cola, but now I only drink water.
The explosion was so powerful that the roof was blown off.
